entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 15 mm near Port Alice. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
